statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_wallet_addresses;
SELECT user_name, wallet_address FROM blockchain_wallet_addresses;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM blockchain_wallet_addresses ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_name, wallet_address FROM blockchain_wallet_addresses WHERE user_id = 'c256bf60-2c5b-4f04-b56e-b3084964d9cb';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_wallet_addresses WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, wallet_address, created_at FROM blockchain_wallet_addresses WHERE user_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_wallet_addresses ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM blockchain_wallet_addresses WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' AND created_at <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT user_name FROM blockchain_wallet_addresses WHERE wallet_address LIKE '%bitcoin%';
SELECT user_id, user_name, wallet_address FROM blockchain_wallet_addresses ORDER BY user_name ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, wallet_address FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transaction FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_transaction DESC;
SELECT u.username, t.amount, t.timestamp FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY t.timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE wallet_address = '0x1234567890abcdef'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 1000
SELECT u.username, t.amount FROM users u INNER JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount > 500 ORDER BY t.amount DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, wallet_address FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE wallet_balance < 5000;
SELECT user_id, username, wallet_balance FROM user_accounts JOIN wallet_balances ON user_accounts.user_id = wallet_balances.user_id WHERE user_accounts.user_id = 2002;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, wallet_address FROM user_accounts WHERE wallet_address LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT u.username, w.wallet_balance FROM user_accounts u JOIN wallet_balances w ON u.user_id = w.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ua JOIN user_transactions ut ON ua.user_id = ut.user_id WHERE ua.user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT username, wallet_address FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT wallet_address, balance FROM balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT email, wallet_address FROM addresses WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, wallet_address FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id;
SELECT wallet_address, balance FROM balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT wallet_address, balance FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT wallet_name, balance FROM wallets WHERE wallet_id = 4;
SELECT timestamp, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT wallet_name, balance FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, COUNT(wallet_id) FROM users JOIN wallets ON users.user_id = wallets.user_id GROUP BY user_id, email;
SELECT transactions.transaction_id, amount, timestamp, username FROM transactions JOIN wallets ON transactions.from_wallet_id = wallets.wallet_id JOIN users ON wallets.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE miner_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%');
